page.title: 17Salhouse Equestrian Centre 1
page.content: The Centre {-----------} Salhouse Equestrian Centre is based in old buildings in Lower Street.It has been a riding school for twenty years. Many of the students come from the Norwich area.The instructors wear a uniform which is : white jodphurs ; blue or white blouse ; hairnet ; riding hat ; tie and black boots.The chief instructor (I.D.A.) wears blue jodphurs. The Horses {-----------} There are twenty-five horses with names like : Bimbo ; Duke ; Kipper and Sugar who is twenty years old.The horses eat : crushed oats ; sugar beet (crushed or cubed) ; chaff (chopped hay) ; crushed barley and bran pellets.
